text: Great Britain snowboarder Katy Ormerod
is out of the Winter Olympics after
suffering a severely fractured right

suffered a minor wrist braid but had
still intended to compete in the

floor I knew like instantly that it was
a really really bad injury like I was in
like excruciating pain and it is a bad
break - as you say she's I've been taken

out of these games words could not
describe like how good it I was like it
was just awful

I've had a few injuries I've snapped my

so I finally saw the x-ray and realized

break like I broke the bone into two

when I'm learning a new trick generally
and my coach will explain to me in what

whether it's in real life or whether a
